subject: Re: Wrap up from our chat....
preview: Hi Heath,  I hope you had a good weekend.  Thanks for sending this through! It's looking great.  I have a couple of queries:  General  - Can all tabs have who please? Although after we spoke the other

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath, I hope you had a good weekend. Thanks for sending this through! It's looking great. I have a couple of queries: General - Can all tabs have who please? Although after we spoke the other day, I have asked the team to use their own log in's (which they will do once the H+C Dashboard is accessible from their log in). Once everyone is using their own login, can the who prepopulate? - Can you change Total Cost in the report and the back end to "Total Purchase Cost" - Please show for all $ if it is inc or ex GST
  • Sold
    • Can you please change sale to Sale Price
o I am keen to be able to see the total $ of what was sold in a period and the $ of what we paid. Can we add a tab at the top of this page with the total of the total purchase cost and the total sale price
  • Retire
    • I am keen to be able to see the total $ of what was retired in a period. Can we add a tab at the top of this page with the total of the total purchase cost
  • Repair
    • A product may be put into repair from be in stock (as in it was damaged in the warehouse, not from an order). Will that be an issue for the order number if it populates?
  • SKU Status Update
    • When this is love, can we block the SKU status from being able to be altered from the back end?
    • As there are lots and lots of orders to choose from, can the order prepopulate?
Thanks Heath! Kind Regards Amy Smith AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Heath, I hope you had a good weekend. Thanks for sending this through! It's looking great. I have a couple of queries: General - Can all tabs have who please? Although after we spoke the other day, I have asked the team to use their own log in's (which they will do once the H+C Dashboard is accessible from their log in). Once everyone is using their own login, can the who prepopulate? - Can you change Total Cost in the report and the back end to "Total Purchase Cost" - Please show for all $ if it is inc or ex GST
  • Sold
    • Can you please change sale to Sale Price
o I am keen to be able to see the total $ of what was sold in a period and the $ of what we paid. Can we add a tab at the top of this page with the total of the total purchase cost and the total sale price
  • Retire
    • I am keen to be able to see the total $ of what was retired in a period. Can we add a tab at the top of this page with the total of the total purchase cost
  • Repair
    • A product may be put into repair from be in stock (as in it was damaged in the warehouse, not from an order). Will that be an issue for the order number if it populates?
  • SKU Status Update
    • When this is love, can we block the SKU status from being able to be altered from the back end?

Thanks Heath! Kind Regards Amy Smith AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy, 

Just a quick end of week update with the report changes. It's coming along well as you will see in the video:
https://www.loom.com/share/3a3f8a8820604b18af506c5bea694270

We will continue to refine and we are aiming to have it all tied up next week. 

Have a great weekend!

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig
Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hello, Wrap up from today… Can we please:
  • sort by popularity index isn't working
make terminology the same across the catalogue / reports table i.e. add active inventory, remove cents from prices, change total to historical totals
  • Add "Total" to reports table, Category Utilization so we can see the toal across all statuses and also in stock % across the whole business
  • available i button should be moved to in stock and say: in stock = available - selection - confirmed
  • send email alert when category % in stock drops below 30%
  • Add H+C dashboard access to staff so they can edit RFP orders (we don't need out own personal dashboard)
Thank you. Kind Regards Amy Smith AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Ok. Are we still good to catch up at 1.30pm.

Kind Regards

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy, 

Apologies for the delay.

We are still working on these, I will have an update for you as we push these updates from staging to live. They are taking a bit of time to get right. 

I'm currently updating the list of SKUs that need to be checked. I'll have this to you shortly.

Hey Joel, 

Can we chat about this one tomorrow?

HI Heath,



I hope you are well.



Just checking in again re my query last week…



I am meeting with the team at 10am on Wednesday. Is there any way we can get 1 and 2 finished before then so I can show the team then? If so, can we chant Tuesday arvo to run through it quickly?



Please let me know.



Thank you.



Kind Regards

Amy Smith



AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hello,



Just thinking, it would be great if the stock report could spit out an excel doc like this (attached) so I can see the total $ across the business and see the report in one spot. I would probably our put these monthly to track sales / damages etc.



Kind Regards

Amy Smith



AMY SMITH CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. amy@huntleyandco.com.au

P. 02 8310 2285 W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hello,


Thanks for your time on the phone this morning. Here is what I would like to try and finalise…


I am meeting with the team at 10am on Wednesday. Is there any way we can get 1 and 2 finished before then so I can show the team then? If so, can we chant Tuesday arvo to run through it quickly?


  1. I would like to try and discourage the team from playing around in the back end. Can we please change how the SKU status is changed so it is done from the front end?


  1. For the stock report, we need the following fields in each status.


Sold

- Date (auto generated)

- Status (auto generated when out into that status)

- Order # (auto generated if relevant….the SKU may be in the warehouse when the status is changed so won't always be associated with an order)

- Notes - who / how / date (this will be a mandatory free text field, but I would like to prompt people as to what to write so if we can say who is sold to / how (i.e. what platform we sold it through) / date of sale)

- SKU (auto generated)

- Total Cost - This figure is in the back end and is made up of sale cost and freight cost (ex GST)

- Sale Cost (ex GST) - (this will be a mandatory free text field)

- Who (this is mandatory a free text field for who has entered the above info)?

Retired

- Date (auto generated)

- Status (auto generated when out into that status)

- Order # (auto generated if relevant….the SKU may be in the warehouse when the status is changed so won't always be associated with an order)

- Notes - why it has been retired i.e. what the damage is and how it happened

- SKU (auto generated)

- Total Cost - This figure is in the back end and is made up of sale cost and freight cost (ex GST)

- Who (this is mandatory a free text field for who has entered the above info)?

Missing

- Date (auto generated)

- Status (auto generated when out into that status)

- Order # (auto generated if relevant….the SKU may be in the warehouse when the status is changed so won't always be associated with an order)

- Notes (this is mandatory a free text field with any notes on what / why it is missing)

- SKU (auto generated)

- Total Cost (auto generated) This figure is in the back end and is made up of sale cost and freight cost (ex GST)

- Who (this is mandatory a free text field for who has entered the above info)?

Repair

- Date (auto generated)

- Status (auto generated when out into that status)

- Order # (auto generated if relevant….the SKU may be in the warehouse when the status is changed so won't always be associated with an order)

- Notes (this is mandatory a free text field with any notes on why it is in repair

- SKU (auto generated)


  1. Is there a way I can generate a report and see the $ figure of stock sold / retired within a month? This helps me to know the COGS.


  1. We also need to include the missing status to:
    • Catalogue Overview and SKU status in Catalogue Overview
    • Category Inventory Utilization Report
    • Product Inventory Utilization


  1. Can we please also include the active inventory number to Catalogue Overview


  1. Lastly, can we please add a search bar in Product Inventory Utilization so you can search all products (not just products in a particular parent category).


Thank you.


Kind Regards

Amy Smith

AMY SMITH
CEO + CREATIVE DIRECTOR

E. AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

P. 02 8310 2285
W. HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU
